name: Molester Simulator
body:
#Molester Simulator

***

##Information:

Calling all perverts and backwards children! Ever wanted to be a molester in real life but figure it's too much work and is not worth the effort? Now you (Virtually) can! Drive your white van all over the city picking up *Babies*, *Women*, and even *Men*! Grab *Viagra*, *WD-40*, and *Tooth Paste* to help boost your score! It's fun for the whole family!

## Features:

* Children
* White vans
* Men
* Women
* Viagra
* WD-40
* Tooth Paste
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
